::Killfest::

Killfest takes the cup, also pouring it into his houlder (?) 
compartment. He takes Motormaster's hand, shaking it.

"Good. We shall see you soon then." He turns around, exiting 
Astroblast, EndBringer following him.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster grabs the can and pours half of it in his houlder 
compartment,
> he then hands it to Killfest. "This cybertronian act has never been 
broken
> by and Autobot, we will not break it either. It represents us as 
comrades
> in arms. It honors the help you gave us." He extends his hand in a 
hand
> shake. "Call us, and we will deal, we know you are trustworthy." he 
speaks.
